channel.title: Uhh
channel.description: Who honestly still plays RuneScape. If you do, do yourself a favor and stop playing lol. My life has been like three times better since I stopped playing =).

item.title: Uhh
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

I play but i have phases, if I think I’ve quit i haven’t really, I’ll take a 2 week break and go on for like 3 hours for a day for a week and it starts all over again, so I’m not gonna cancel membership. yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Uhh
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Chimaera God:

I’m not trying to convnce people to stop playing a game that has literally turned to crap in the last 3 months. It’s common sense actually.

No, it’s your opinion really. Some people still like RuneScape and will therefore continue to play. Your opinion will not change anyone’s mind.

Read full topic

item.title: Uhh
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Recently i had like a 1 week phase of non stop runescape fletching… i haven’t been on for like 1 week and a half now.

I think used all ma runescape juice up :(.

Read full topic

item.title: Uhh
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I haven’t really quit playing. I sign on every week or two, but i don’t do anything much like cut yew etc…

After the 3k trade limit was put on I still played for a bit, thinking “nahh they can’t stop me” but after a while everything did get really boring on runescape for the first time.

Plus the fact that I have now, lots of exams at school. So yeah I don’t play at all as much as i used to (used to be 1hour+ a day)

Read full topic

item.title: Uhh
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Chimaera God:

I’ve definately lived on both spectrums. Playing RuneScape never made my day fun.

If you had lived on both ends then you would not try to convince people to stop playing.

you are lieing to yourself

i played for 5 years but my last year of playing was very interesting for me

and i play occasionally on my friends account.

item.title: Uhh
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I still play but I am not addicted. I play to make my day more abstract and not a certain order of things. Perhaps you should live on both ends of the spectrum before giving people advice ;).
